points: Created a microservice to establish a robust data pipeline between client databases and our system, automating the extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) process for seamless integration.

Solely manage, deploy, and troubleshoot all services of Saarthi.ai for Bank of Maharashtra within the bankâ€™s infrastructure, automating tasks, diagnosing issues, and communicating resolutions to ensure smooth operations.
Automated the initiation of call campaigns based on the integrated data, improving efficiency and ensuring real-time synchronization for two clients.
Maintained and deployed scalable microservices architecture with Kubernetes, automating tasks using cron jobs.
Implemented new features for WhatsApp and SMS services using Kaleyra API and Engineered WhatsApp/Voice bots.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy multilingual AI BOTs, reducing the lifecycle of new BOT products.
Enhanced the functionality of the AI-based Math solver platform, enabling efficient resolution of 10+ Math chapters by collaborating with the solver team.
Crafted several UI components, including four math modules actively utilized by thousands of students.
Resolved 100+ critical bugs of several problems, ensuring seamless user experience and preparing the product for release.
